meanings.definition: Not altered or modified in any way
meanings.sent1: The magazine featured unretouched photos of the natural landscape.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the unretouched version of the painting, appreciating its raw beauty.
meanings.sent3: The unretouched cake looked so plain that it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her unretouched honesty was like a breath of fresh air in a world of lies.
meanings.sent5: The unretouched sky at sunset painted a stunning picture in the horizon.

meanings.sent1: The documentary showcased unretouched footage of the wildlife in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent2: The unretouched photograph captured the true essence of the moment.
meanings.sent3: His unretouched story was so genuine that it touched everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent4: The unretouched reality of the situation hit them harder than any edited version could.
meanings.sent5: The unretouched beauty of the old building revealed its history and character.

meanings.sent1: The painting was displayed unretouched, exactly as the artist had left it.
meanings.sent2: She sang the song unretouched, showcasing her true vocal talent.
meanings.sent3: He ran unretouched through the finish line, surprising everyone with his speed.
meanings.sent4: The story was told unretouched, without any added drama or exaggeration.
meanings.sent5: The old photograph was displayed unretouched, preserving its historical significance.
